alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Eastern Union; Hudson; Western Essex; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 12:19PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF HUDSON...EASTERN UNION... EASTERN ESSEX...WESTERN UNION...WESTERN ESSEX...AND EASTERN BERGEN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1219 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from Paterson to near Richboro and moving east at 40 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Newark, Elizabeth, Plainfield, Bloomfield, Linden, Orange, Summit, Lyndhurst, Millburn, Rutherford, Secaucus, Harrison, Caldwell, Kearny, and Clark. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
